item.title: David add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "He who believes in Him is not condemned;but he who does not believe in Him is condemned already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten son of God" -- Anonymous

item.title: David add a quote by George Mann
item.description: "The sun was a watery, baleful eye that glared down at the Thames through a bruised eyelid of rain clouds" -- George Mann

item.title: David add a quote by Laura Hillenbrand
item.description: "the athletes were treated to a thunderous show that culminated in the release of twenty thousand doves. As the birds circled in panicked confusion, cannons began firing, prompting the birds to relieve themselves over the athletes. With each report, the birds let fly." -- Laura Hillenbrand

item.title: David add a quote by Laura Hillenbrand
item.description: "When Louie was in his sixties, he was still climbing Cahuenga Peak every week and running a mile in under six minutes. In his seventies, he discovered skateboarding. At eighty-five, he returned to Kwajalein on a project, ultimately unsuccessful," -- Laura Hillenbrand

item.title: David add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "And the Vatican, whatever anyone else might have thought on the subject, answered, like Hebrew National hot dogs, to "a higher authority." -- Anonymous
